#    Table format:	Format A

#IMPORT file://include/common-control.txt
#IMPORT file://include/ascii-1963-symbols.txt
#IMPORT file://include/petscii-lowercase.txt

# define duplicates first
#IMPORT file://include/petscii-uppercase-duplicate.txt
#IMPORT file://include/box-line-drawing-duplicate.txt
0xE9	0x1FB99	#UPPER RIGHT TO LOWER LEFT FILL
0xFA	0x2713	#CHECK MARK

#IMPORT file://include/box-line-drawing.txt
#IMPORT file://include/petscii-uppercase.txt
#IMPORT file://include/vic20-c0-c1.txt

0x5C	0x00A3	#POUND SIGN
0xA9	0x1FB99	#UPPER RIGHT TO LOWER LEFT FILL
0xBA	0x2713	#CHECK MARK
0xFF	0x1FB95	#CHECKER BOARD FILL
